characters.singleQuery: query getCharacter($id: ID!) { character(id: $id) { id name species image status gender origin { dimension } } }
characters.query: query getCharacters($page: Int!) { characters(page: $page) { info { count } results { id name species image } } }

locations.singleQuery: query getLocation($id: ID!) { location(id: $id) { id name type dimension } }
locations.query: query getLocations($page: Int!) { locations(page: $page) { info { count } results { id name type } } }
